job.title: Data Integration Engineer, Experienced
job.industry: Defense & Space,Information Technology and Services,Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing
job.description: at naval nuclear laboratory nnl we recognize that excellent employees are the key to excellent customer service and working for us means you will be part of a culture where diversity teamwork and collaboration is valued it is a truly exciting time for nnl as we search for experienced individuals to help lead the way as we leverage cloud solutions to address the needs of our user communityltbrgtltbrgtas a data integration engineer at nnl you will join a team that not only integrates solutions across multiple clouds but also to helps set company direction by defining standards best practices and patternsltbrgtltbrgtyour understanding of microsoft azure integration tools api management service oriented architecture and cloud solutions will serve you well as you work to help us address the changing needs of our business partners in new and exciting waysltbrgtltbrgtjoin our team dedicated to delivering exceptional it service supporting the worlds best navy
